EngLawName: Standard for the Tolerance of Heavy Metals in Rice
LawName: 食米重金屬限量標準（93.03.05訂定）
EngLawHistories:
1.Promulgated on March 5, 2004
2.Amended on August 29, 2007
3.Amended on August 20, 2013
4.Abolished on August 15, 2019

EngLawArticles.EngArticleContent: This Standard is prescribed in accordance with the provisions of Article 17 of the Act Governing Food Sanitation.
This Standard shall be implemented from the date of promulgation.
